summary.span: Monitors two dataflow sources, invoking the provided handler for whichever source makes data available first.

span.span: A that represents the asynchronous choice.

returns.span: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.

span.span: If both sources are completed prior to the choice completing, the resulting task will be canceled.

returns.span: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the state and will contain the unhandled exception.

span.span: When one of the sources has data available and successfully propagates it to the choice, the resulting task will complete when the handler completes; if the handler throws an exception, the task will end in the state and will contain the unhandled exception.

returns.span: Otherwise, the task will end with its set to either 0 or 1 to represent the first or second source, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦決定目標區塊接受或拒絕的項目，但除非否則取決於特殊的語意的目標區塊，它不會等候要實際處理的項目，這個方法會傳回。This method will return once the target block has decided to accept or decline the item, but unless otherwise dictated by special semantics of the target block, it does not wait for the item to actually be processed. 例如， ，將會傳回它已儲存的已張貼的項目到其輸入佇列時)。For example, will return from as soon as it has stored the posted item into its input queue). 從區塊處理的觀點來看`Post`為非同步。From the perspective of the block's processing, `Post` is asynchronous. 提供的訊息，該支援延後的目標區塊或區塊可能會在進行更多的處理其`Post`實作中，請考慮使用，這會立即傳回，並可讓延後的已張貼的訊息目標然後稍後再使用它之後`SendAsync`傳回。For target blocks that support postponing offered messages, or for blocks that may do more processing in their `Post` implementation, consider using , which will return immediately and will enable the target to postpone the posted message and later consume it after `SendAsync` returns.
